member.name: M:LucasRT.RavenDB.SalesAssistant.RestApi.Domain.Entities.Leads.AiKnowledge.GetAIFieldsInstructions
member.summary: Provides instructions for generating AI field values based on specific criteria.
member.remarks:
This method returns an object with predefined instructions for each field:
FriendlyName: Use only the first and main composed names, avoiding surnames.
VoiceTarget: Generate a writing target instruction based on age and gender, if available. Use a neutral professional approach if this information is not provided.
PersonalEmails: Include the best personal generic emails, separated by semicolons. Avoid professional emails or those not belonging to the person.
ProfessionalEmail: Include a professional or student email associated with a company domain. If the domain suggests a company or university, use it; otherwise, leave it blank.
Company: Derive the company name from the professional email domain. Use "Student" for university domains, or leave blank if indeterminate.
SpokenLanguage: Specify the spoken language and cultural context.
member.returns: An object containing detailed instructions for populating AI fields, including guidelines for names, email addresses, company identification, and language specifications.
